Class SmartTargetEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Renderable
      • ImageBox
        • OnGrid
          • Entity
            • Moving
              • Enemy
                • SmartTargetEnemy

  • public class SmartTargetEnemy
extends Enemy
    An enemy that uses the A Star Path Finding algorithm to move towards the player. Moves in a random direction if no path could be found.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Josiah Richards

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartTargetEnemy

        public SmartTargetEnemy(int x,
                        int y,
                        Map map,
                        Direction startingDirection)
                 throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Creates a new smart targeting enemy at a given location for a given map and facing a given direction.
        Parameters:
        x - The starting x coordinate for this enemy.
        y - The starting y coordinate for this enemy.
        map - The map this enemy is on.
        startingDirection - The direction this enemy should face
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If the sprite for this enemy is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • getMetaInfo

        public java.lang.String getMetaInfo()
        Description copied from class: OnGrid
        Gets the meta info, if any, that should be saved to file for this object.
        Overrides:
        getMetaInfo in class OnGrid
        Returns:
        The string line of meta info for this object, null if there is none.

      • aStarPathFindNextMove

        public Direction aStarPathFindNextMove(Vector2 target)
        Returns the next direction this enemy should move in to reach a target. Uses the A Star Path Finding algorithm and returns a random valid direction if no path is found.
        Parameters:
        target - The grid coordinate we want to get to.
        Returns:
        The direction we should move to get to the target, this direction is random if no path is found.

      • getNextMove

        public Direction getNextMove()
        Description copied from class: Enemy
        Calculates the next direction this enemy should move in.
        Specified by:
        getNextMove in class Enemy
        Returns:
        The next direction this enemy should move in.
